markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 0" pfs="">[Blood-Soaked Soil](/Hazards.aspx?ID=134)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 64</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

The blood of those who died in the area bubbles up from the earth, soaking the soil and turning it into a bloody morass.

---

**Stealth**
DC 16 (trained) to smell blood

**Disable**
DC 18 [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (trained) to settle the spirits or DC 19 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (trained) to bless the area

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Seep Blood** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Trigger** A creature enters the area; **Effect** Blood seeps up from the earth, turning the area into sucking, gory mud. The area becomes difficult terrain for 1 hour. All creatures in or moving through the area must succeed at a DC 16 Reflex save, or they become [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until they can [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 16).

---
**Reset**
1 day
